website_summaries.verdict: This chic manicure table is perfect for your salon. The extra-large table has plenty of space for optimal client comfort.
pros: Locking cabinet has five removable drawers, so you have plenty of room to store your equipment
Features swing-arm technician lamp and an extra-thick wrist pad for comfort

customer_reviews.title: The lamp is so cheap and bad quality that it was all crangled
customer_reviews.text: The fan was not working. The lamp is so cheap and bad quality that it was all crangled. Very cheap and bad quality- only one positive thing- a lot of the little trays to keep small items organized. 200$ just waisted.
customer_reviews.author: SV

customer_reviews.title: Like this very much didnt give five stars cuz it ...
customer_reviews.text: Like this very much didnt give five stars cuz it does get a little damage on the way but nothing to big scratches here and there
customer_reviews.author: ED

customer_reviews.title: What I did not like...
customer_reviews.text: What I disliked was the damage to most parts. The lamp shade was disfigured, there were numerous scratches, the locking mechanisms don’t work. For instance, when you turn the lock with key, it has no place to lock into. Therefore the doors just swing open. I would have sent it back, but it took a while to assemble since the instructions are basic pictures. No details whatsoever.
customer_reviews.author: MsRadar

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking, sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking, sturdy, and lots of storage space in the drawers. Drawers are tall enough to store polish upright. I’m very pleased with this table.
customer_reviews.author: Karen M Rhymer

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality but somewhat difficult setup
customer_reviews.text: Took about 30-45 minutes to setup. Instructions weren’t as easy to follow along but isn’t too hard to figure out alone. Overall great quality and very useful table. Pleased with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Lee M.

customer_reviews.title: The table looks very nice. Although it took some time putting it together
customer_reviews.text: The table looks very nice. Although it took some time putting it together. The company didn't send enough bolts for the top and even after I tried to email the company and Amazon I couldn't get any or the size so after trial and error and a couple trips to the hardware store, I finally got it put together. The doors don't fit ever all either.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Degenhardt

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: When I got this table I noticed the back panel was bent. There were also s few drawers that were cracked and chipped. Also there were scratches all over the table. The light didnt come with a block to plug into and it was just thrown into a box instead of packaged nicely. And not worth the money you pay
customer_reviews.author: BRANDY MIDDLEMISS

customer_reviews.title: The drawers are the worst part they can fall doen anytime when you try ...
customer_reviews.text: The drawers are the worst part they can fall doen anytime when you try to take anything out of them.
customer_reviews.author: harry

customer_reviews.title: Cheap product
customer_reviews.text: Some cracks on the table one cubby was broken and I did not receive the lamp as advertised!! Super annoyed..:(
customer_reviews.author: B

customer_reviews.title: Perfect! Exactly what it said that was included
customer_reviews.text: Perfect thank you so much for Sending in a timely matter as I asked ❤️
customer_reviews.author: gigi

customer_reviews.title: Nothing
customer_reviews.text: It’s really sturdy but the suction on it is terrible !!
customer_reviews.author: Chevy

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: The key does not lock, I can not understand why?
customer_reviews.author: Lourdes GrossiAmazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: This was the worse the material suck. I'm ashamed at Amazon for selling this crap.
customer_reviews.author: Latasha Sharp

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: I am so disappointed in the product I have received a damaged product I'm so angry 200 of my hard earned money bought a damaged piece
customer_reviews.author: hazel johnson

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice table but missing 2 screws but over all in love.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product
customer_reviews.text: PlBack panels of product came a little bent up but still was sturdy and an awesome product. My girlfriend loves it for doing nails. I would have given this product five (5) stars if it wasn't for the nylon material on the back of the arm rest.
customer_reviews.author: Tarif

customer_reviews.title: Cheap Quality
customer_reviews.text: Super very Cheap Quality! Practical but, Horrible quality...Do not recomend!
customer_reviews.author: Magda Ivelisse

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: Trays arrive with cracks and splits, some were stained with dirt, table has scratches. When you pay for something new you expect it new
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: What a pain. I give up!
customer_reviews.text: This comes with a protective paper on each side of each board and it is practically impossible to get it off mine is still half on! I give up!
customer_reviews.author: JackieO

customer_reviews.title: Didn't come with instructions, keys only work for one ...
customer_reviews.text: Didn't come with instructions, keys only work for one lock and the other is clearly from another desk so I can't lock it and the door won't stay shut now. The little padded thing is shredded on the bottom but luckily you don't see that part. The lamp shade was bent and had to be reshaped to fit the mechanism together. Would've been acceptable issues if this desk was half this price.
customer_reviews.author: Orias Bastet

customer_reviews.title: perfect
customer_reviews.text: The desk exceeded our expectations. The desk is well made and it is sturdy, and the desk lamp light is very beautiful, Looks very texture. And the table comes with many drawers, you can store many things in it. Really love it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very functional!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely, love my nail table. It is super classy and beautiful. It only took about 45 minutes to put it together with ease. It is quite usefully and durable. Also, it comes with a soft Pillow. You will love it if u have a try. Recommend!.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Giantex Manicure Nail Table Station Black Steel Frame Beauty Spa Salon Equipment Drawer
product_meta.description:
Description

This deluxe extra-large steel-frame manicure table is exactly what you need for the manicure station at your upscale salon or spa. Classic black styling is built throughout the sturdy steel frame. The extra thick pad offers maximum comfort to your clients. The two locking cabinets each hold 5 removable easy-clean plastic drawers so you can securely store all your polishes, chemicals, and tools. This nail table also comes with an electric downdraft nail vent so you can minimize dust when filing and suck away noxious chemical odors. The table also comes with a FREE swing-arm technician lamp that uses standard light bulbs (bulb not included).

Features

Brand new and high quality

LED lamp with adjuatable neckgoose

Includes electric downdraft nail vent to minimize dust and carry away fumes

Black Steel Frame provides sturdy support

2 Locking cabinets each hold 5 removable easy-clean plastic drawers

4 smooth-rolling casters allow for easy table mobility when needed

Specifications

Color: Black

Material: Steel frame+ MDF cover + PP drawer

Table: 47"L x 17"W x 29"H

Vent: 9.25"L x 5"W

Pillow: 13"L x 4" W x2"H

Individual Drawer Dimensions: 13"L x 9"W x 3"D

Package includes:1 x Manicure Table+1 x Pillow+1 x Lamp+1 x Vent+10 x Drawers
feature_bullets: 『Four Wheels』4 smooth-rolling casters allow for easy table mobility when you needed, it is easy to move it to any place.
『With Lamp』The table comes with a free swing-arm technician lamp that uses standard light bulbs (Bulb not included). It will offer you more brighter light.
『Ergonomically Designed』Comes with an electric downdraft nail vent so you can minimize dust when filing and suck away noxious chemical odors.
『Durable Constructions』Classic black styling is built throughout the sturdy steel frame, this steel-frame manicure table is designed for years of use.
『Enough Storage Space』The two locking cabinets each hold 5 removable easy-clean plastic drawers. So you can securely store all your polishes, chemicals, and tools.
